Sentencas: Ni/Al2O3 with the doping of CeO2 was found to have useful activity to reform ethane and propane with steam under Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) conditions, 700-900 degrees C. CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 with 14% ceria doping content showed the best reforming activity among those with the ceria content between 0 and 20%.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: The amount of carbon formation decreased with increasing Ce content.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: However, Ni was easily oxidized when more than 16% of ceria was doped.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: Compared to conventional Ni/Al2O3, 14%CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 provides significantly higher reforming reactivity and resistance toward carbon deposition.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: These enhancements are mainly due to the influence of the redox properties of doped ceria.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: Regarding the temperature programmed reduction experiments (TPR-1), the redox properties and the oxygen storage capacity (OSC) for the catalysts increased with increasing Cc doping content.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: In addition, it was also proven in the present work that the redox of these catalysts are reversible, according to the temperature programmed oxidation (TPO) and the second time temperature programmed reduction (TPR-2) results.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: During the reforming process, in addition to the reactions on Ni surface, the gas-solid reactions between the gaseous components presented in the system (C2H6, C3H8, C2H4, CH4, CO2, CO, H2O, and H-2) and the lattice oxygen (O-x) on ceria surface also take place.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: The reactions of adsorbed surface hydrocarbons with the lattice oxygen (O-x) on ceria surface (CnHm+O-x -> nCO+m/2(H-2)+Ox-n) can prevent the formation of carbon species on Ni surface froth hydrocarbons decomposition reaction (CnHm double left right arrow nC+m/2H(2)).
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2

Sentencas: Moreover, the formation of carbon via Boudard reaction (2CO double left right arrow CO2+C) is also reduced by the gas-solid reaction of carbon monoxide (produced from steam reforming) with the lattice oxygen (CO+O-x double left right arrow CO2+Ox-1).
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of ethane and propane over CeO2-doped Ni/Al2O3 at SOFC temperature:: Improvement of resistance toward carbon formation by the redox property of doping CeO2
